main.name: Derek Etherton
main.description: Lover of software design, go (圍棋), and mountains. Thoughtful & calm in all things, I'm always eager for a challenge
main.bio: A solid foundation in software design, algorithms, data structures, and a variety of programming paradigms makes me a quick learner comfortable working with any modern technology. Over a year of working in Android helped me develop some strong Java fundamentals, which I've further improved working with Spring at RBC. I've spent thousands of hours on the web basics (ES6, HTML5, SCSS), received training in Angular 7 and have also built sites using React & Node (like this one). In all pursuits I'm guided by SOLID principles, and keep a design patterns & code smells cheatsheet handy. Yes, I can build "RESTful APIs" (it'd be a struggle not to).

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
